title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: This exquisite bow features a dark, intricate design, highlighting an elegant blend of material and craftsmanship. The frame is accented with striking green elements that give it a mystical appearance, suggesting a connection to nature or magic. Its sharp curves and spikes imply both beauty and danger, making it a formidable weapon in the right hands. This bow is not just a tool for archery; it embodies a sense of ancient lore. Players wielding this item can expect enhanced accuracy and power, making it an invaluable asset in their quest for glory and conquest in the game world.
